GAME

Class EnvironmentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • GAME.EnvironmentBuilder

  • public class EnvironmentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This "EnvironmentBuilder" class is responsible for painting the current status of the environment of the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnvironmentBuilder(Solitaire game, Location stock, Location talon, Location[] foundation, Location[] tableau, Location[] formerTab, int[] toggleArray)
      This constructor is needed for instantiating this class and sets the corresponding attributes of this class with values passed in it

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void build()
      "build" method just paints on the environment attribute of the class the current status of the game.
      boolean buildifWon(boolean ifwon)
      buildifWon method paints the on the enviroment attribute the graphics of the game when the game is finished.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBimage(java.lang.String path)
      This method gets the buffered image specified by the path given.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getEnvironment()
      this method gets the current status of the environment of the game.
      void loadCall()
      loadCall method only happens if a game state is loaded and the environment will adjust to the game.

      void mouseMove()

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnvironmentBuilder

        public EnvironmentBuilder(Solitaire game,
                          Location stock,
                          Location talon,
                          Location[] foundation,
                          Location[] tableau,
                          Location[] formerTab,
                          int[] toggleArray)
        This constructor is needed for instantiating this class and sets the corresponding attributes of this class with values passed in it
        Parameters:
        game - of type Solitaire holds the data and the current state of the game.
        stock - of type Location holds the current location of the stock pile in gui.
        talon - of type Location holds the current location of the cards in the talon pile in gui.
        foundation - of type Location[] holds the current location of the foundation piles in gui.
        tableau - of type Location[] holds the current location of the open cards in the tableau piles.
        formerTab - of type Location[] holds the location of the movablee/moving card/cards in the tableau piles.
        toggleArray - of type int[] holds the current condition of the cards, which will tell what's on top and is moving.

        Returns:

      • loadCall

        public void loadCall()
        loadCall method only happens if a game state is loaded and the environment will adjust to the game.

      • buildifWon

        public boolean buildifWon(boolean ifwon)
        buildifWon method paints the on the enviroment attribute the graphics of the game when the game is finished.
        Parameters:
        ifwon - dictates if the game is finished.
        Returns:
        it returns true if the game is finished and false if not.
